title: Honoring John Scalesi upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition as being named 2010 Person of the Year by the Bellmore Herald
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION,  honoring John Scalesi upon the occasion of his
designation for special recognition as being named 2010  Person  of  the
Year by the Bellmore Herald

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, John Scalesi has given not only of his time and energies  but
also of his competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently has
been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS,  This  Legislative Body is justly proud to honor John Scalesi
upon the occasion of his designation for special  recognition  as  being
named 2010 Person of the Year by the Bellmore Herald; and
  WHEREAS,  John Scalesi, a lifelong resident of Bellmore, New York, and
graduate of Mepham High School, has served his community as a  volunteer
from a young age; and
  WHEREAS,  Since  the age of 10, John Scalesi found comfort and support
in the North Bellmore Fire Department where he spent much  of  his  time
and discovered his passion for helping others in the community; and
  WHEREAS, John Scalesi is still active in the Bellmore Fire Department,
and  is  an  honorary lifetime member of the North Bellmore Fire Depart-
ment's Company No. 2; and
  WHEREAS, Always eager to help others, John Scalesi pursued a career as
an Emergency Medical  Technician  (EMT)  at  Nassau  University  Medical
Center;  he  later became an EMT for the Nassau County Sheriff's Depart-
ment; and
  WHEREAS, John Scalesi has been called upon to contribute his time  and
talents to countless civic and charitable endeavors and has always given
of himself unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS,  In  his four decades as a volunteer, John Scalesi has been a
key player in many community organizations including, Kiwanis  Club  and
Lions  Club,  and  is a community advisor for Mepham's Key Club; he also
serves as the liaison between the Kiwanis and Mepham Key Clubs; and
  WHEREAS, John Scalesi acts as a citizen responder, regularly  carrying
a  police scanner and fearlessly responding to call after call, ensuring
Bellmore is a better place to live for all of its residents; and
  WHEREAS. Throughout the entire period  of  his  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive involvement, John Scalesi has stood constant in
dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to commend  individ-
uals  of outstanding character, who have shown initiative and commitment
toward constantly pursuing higher goals for themselves,  and  acting  as
role models of leadership to be emulated by both peers and young people;
now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor John Scalesi upon the occasion  of  his  designation  for  special
recognition  as  being  named  2010  Person  of the Year by the Bellmore
Herald; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to John Scalesi, Bellmore, New York.
